code: import React from"react";import{useContext}from"react";import FeedbackContext from"../context/FeedbackContext";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FeedbackStats(){var _useContext=useContext(FeedbackContext),feedback=_useContext.feedback;var average=feedback.reduce(function(acc,curr){return acc+curr.rating;},0)/feedback.length;average=average.toFixed(1).replace(/[.,]0$/,"");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feedback-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[feedback.length," reviews"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Average Rating : ",isNaN(average)?0:average]})]});}export default FeedbackStats;
